title: Dedicating the Success of Our Service to Srila Prabhupada | @madhupanditdasaofficial
speaker: HDG Srila Prabhupada

segments.text: Bro, it's been like 24 years that Lordships made divine appearance in the HK Hill
and every moment we relish in HK Hill, it's just because devotees like you have worked hard.
I'm very thankful to you because the sacrifices and hardships that you have taken
to construct this temple, because of which we are relishing here.
I have basically two questions for you, bro.
The first question is, there must have been many hurdles and difficulties
while you were trying to construct this temple.
What always kept you motivated?
This is my first question.
And second question, in the past two to three decades,
whatever has happened in your leadership is a miracle.
Coming up with the mega temples like this, soulful japa modules.
How do you feel about your success in the mission of Guru?
Devotees, they live their life on a day-to-day basis.
They have faith.
That following Prabhupada's instructions of chanting Hare Krishna Maha Mantra 16 rounds
and following the morning sadhana,
one gets guided, protected by the Lord the whole day.
In spite of all the weaknesses.
In spite of all the fall downs.
Overarching protection of the Lord is there.
And His will will be manifest through devotees who follow the instructions of the spiritualist.
So in the process, lot of obstacles from the material point of view.
There will be all kinds of obstacles just like any other institution building.
All those obstacles will be there.
But here, we don't deal with those obstacles on our own.
Neither we carry that burden on our head too much.
We leave it to the Lord and execute our devotional service.
And He gives the intelligence to deal with the such problems.
See that includes the loving kindness, the love for the Lord, the prayers, the prayers of sacred leaders and the prayers of the devotees.
All that He gives to the devotees.
And the paradigms of the devotees.
This is also predicated on us.
All our good deeds shall be inculcated in the sense of our actions.
And we have to work and work and work.
That shall be the right way.
The path of the devotees is not a path of truth.
The path of the devotees is a path of faith.
And the path of the devotees is a path ofance.

That following Prabhupada's process that is given
